tr.td: Process rt_webmonelog (web eventlog server) added to startup. /cs
_opwin removed from homepage name. index.html set as defaultname. /cs
Possibility to configure which objectgraph jar-files that should be loaded (BaseComponent or ABB). /cs
New components for On/Off burner control, CompOnOffBurner and CompOnOffZone. /cs
Button for Eventlog in operators menu added. /cs
Attribute LoadArchives added to WebHandler with new type WebLoadArchiveMask. /cs
Default background color in GeTextField changed from Inherit to lightgrey. /cs
Bugfix in dynamic HostObject in web interface. /cs
Problem with double appearence of alarm when communication is bad fixed. /cs
Check at io startup if multiple signals are connected to the same channel. /cs
Application build method for Application and PlcProcess objects. /cs
Click time increated for MB2 (create object) in wtt. /cs
Attribute BuildCmd moved/added to Application and PlcProcess. /cs
'Create Object' added to the Plc Editor popupmenu. /cs
Connect methods for GetATv, StoAtv, CStoATv, GetDTv etc added. /cs
Bugfix in remtrans table. If multicast object found, object was not displayed. /cs
Bugfix in trace attribute for GetIpToA. /cs
Property EscapeStore for dynamic type ValueInput added. /cs
Toolbar with icons for the methods of the selected object added. /cs
Scroll and zoom with arrow keys and mouse wheel. Scroll buttons in tools. /cs
Fileview for import of pwg and image files. /cs
Font size in alarmtexts in operator window can be changed. /cs
New syntax for function key definition file (gtk version). /cs
Gtk version of rt_trace. Navigator window inserted in main window. /cs
Support for bootnodes added, i.e. copying of package to other nodes than the actual process or operator station. /cs
Established new callback function for glibc malloc memory checks. /rk
Wait for all threads to set its priority before changing real and effective user id. /rk
Wait a while for correct scheduler to be set before starting threads. /rk
Attribute changed from enum to mask or v.v. was not converted. /cs
Performance improved when opening a node, and displaying the packages in the distributor. /cs
Execute order was not displayed on aarithm objects and other objects with graphmethod 2. /cs
Byte order dependency added for PRM data in profibus configurator. /cs
Try with smaller posix message queue if system does not support big queues. /rk
Volume versioncheck for volref removed if volume is not yet loaded. /rk
Bugfix in classcache for large classes. /rk
Bugfix in rtt crossreference list. Individual attributes were listed in RttObjectList. /cs
Bugfix in GetSp: short string could cause compile problems. /cs
Listdescriptor for channellist adapted to V4.x. /cs
Bugfix: CStoIp, StoIp, StoAToIp and CStoAToIp with In-input not connected, did not fetch the supplied value. /cs
Format for Time and DeltaTime in table added. /cs
New Value, ValueInput and Button subgraphs with Right and Center adjustment. /cs
Adjustment property (Left/Right/Center) added to annotations and table object. /cs
Hysteresis in object graph for BaseSensor and subclasses displayed wrong value. /cs
Search string didn't search in AttrRef attributes. /cs
Object attributes channels and signals displayed in Device table. /cs
Bugfix in wb_name, segment(0) returned invalid name for root objects. /cs
Bugfix: change text without selecting any text object caused segfault. /cs
UpdateClasses also converts the input and output masks in function objects. /cs
Local mode added to CompModeDM and BaseMValve. /cs
StructName in ObjBodyDef inserted in PostCreate method. /cs
Property for selected cell color in GrowTable. /cs
Bugfix in classeditor. Change of classname caused unidentified class of the template object of the class. /cs
New class GetDatap added, to fetch datainputs in template plc. /cs
New classes CompPID and CompModePID: PID controller divided in main object and function object. /cs
Bugfix for $user attributes. Scan function for dynamics wasn't called. /cs
Update Class added in menu, and new commands: 'update classes' and 'check classes'. /cs
Update of instance objects when a class is modified (without reload). /lw
Bit type added in Invisible to check visibility on bits in a bitmap. /cs
Object instances can be used in graphs in Window and Folder objects. /cs
Attribute ManMode added to Mode class, to avoid code in object graph. /cs
Owner added to GrowWindow and GrowFolder. /cs
Possibility to use local database in DigLowColor, ToggleDig, Slider insensitiv, and Invisible. /cs
Conversion between different versions av classes handles conversion from Objid to AttrRef and from AttrRef to Objid. /cs
Build Node window is not displayed if there is only one configured node for the current volume. Submenu on Build removed. /cs
Bugfix in Ge Open window, null filename could cause empty list. /cs
Possibility to freeze dbs versions, i.e. minor changes can be made without version mismatch. /cs
Attribute DisableAlarm added to CompLimit to make it possible to use the limit supervision in BaseSensor without alarm. /cs
Added some commentation. Fixed bug in pb_ai and pb_di. 3-byte input where not properly aligned when byte swapping. /cj
References in superclass was not displayed in the navigator when option Object Reference or Attribute Reference was selected. /cs
Separate ld_node file for each node. Possibility to configure a FriendNode object under a NodeConfig object. /cs
New profibus module classes for ET200M, and slave classes for IM153 and IM155 /cs
Bugfix in time_Dcomp, 0 was not returned for equal times. /cs
New signals for absolute and delta time, and plc objects for time arithmetics added. /cs
Bugfix in dataarithm compilation, space at end of line could cause error. /cs
Bugfix in GetData compilation, error when referenced parameter was a type (not a class) not handled. /cs
Modified attribute added to RootVolume, SubVolume and SharedVolume. /cs
Copy with keep references added to wtt menu. /cs
Bugfix in annotation input. Insert of new characters might cause segmentation fault. /cs
Configuration wizard started when entering an empty directoryvolume. /cs

Build methods added. 'Compile', 'create loadfile' and 'create bootfile' replaced by 'build object', 'build volume' and 'build node'. 'build object', 'build volume' and 'build node' also available as wtt commands. /cs
Replaces old unsent subscriptions with new fresh ones. /rk
Cleaning (zero-ing) of timed out subscription data. /rk
Changed interface to qcom_Put. Added attributes msg_id and prio in qcom_sPut structure. /rk
Subscription for Table (select array) and AnalogColor was not always unreferenced. /cs
Command for collect remove and collect remove/clear in menu. /cs
Check before creating a toplevel object if class is a valid in the current window. /cs
New wizard for configuration of directory volume. /cs
Bugfix, bookmark in xtthelp was case sensitive. /cs
Bookmark inserted for every attribute in class xtthelp. /cs
Popupmenu for object with DevBody only could not be opened. /cs
Bugfix. Unhandled exception in DeleteObject and DeleteTree if not in edit mode. /cs
Connect to script extern variables in Value, Invisible, SetDig, ToggleDig, DigShift and OptionMenu. /cs
New script functions SetAttribute, OpenGraph, CloseGraph, SetSubwindow and CheckSystemGroup. /cs
New commands: open graph, delete graph, set subwindow and release subwindow. /cs
'#' alternative to '!' for comment in script. /cs
'delete' statement added to remove external variables. /cs
Bugfix in GeValue: string was sometimes updated every scan. /cs
WGe, new class to open Ge graphs in development environment. /cs
